values: 家庭成员；同住一所房子的人；户；家庭；家族
家庭的；家内的；一家的；家喻户晓的；日常的；家常的；普通的

word_group.brief_definition: 家电；家用电器；家电设备
家庭收入；住户收入；家庭总收入
家用物品；家用物资；家居物品
家庭责任；家务责任；家庭职责
家务；家庭职责；家庭义务

bilingual.source: Household waste can be roughly divided into food waste.
bilingual.target: 家庭垃圾大致可以分为厨余垃圾。

bilingual.source: The classification of household waste aims to help people separate different types of waste.
bilingual.target: 家庭垃圾分类旨在帮助人们区分不同类型的垃圾。

bilingual.source: The first batch of cities to introduce household waste classification and sorting includes Beijing, Shanghai, Tianjin, Chongqing and all capitals of provinces and autonomous regions.
bilingual.target: 首批引入家庭垃圾分类和分类的城市包括北京、上海、天津、重庆以及所有省会和自治区首府。

bilingual.source: A homemaker often manages the household budget.
bilingual.target: 家庭主妇经常管理家庭预算。

bilingual.source: Many families in urban areas have a one-child household.
bilingual.target: 许多城市家庭都是独生子女家庭。
他们的家庭收入增加了。

bilingual.source: Many housewives manage their household finances very efficiently.
bilingual.target: 许多家庭主妇非常有效地管理家庭财务。

bilingual.source: The household budget is tight this month.
bilingual.target: 这个月的家庭预算很紧张。

bilingual.source: She is very attentive to household affairs.
bilingual.target: 她对家庭事务非常上心。

bilingual.source: He was raised in a Presbyterian household.
bilingual.target: 他在一个长老会家庭中长大。

list.abstract: household（英 [ˈhaʊshəʊld]，美 [ˈhaʊshoʊld]），英语单词，作名词为家庭；一家人；王室。例句：Wet waste is known as household waste.（湿垃圾被称为家庭垃圾。） household的近义词有family、race等。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know you could calculate the mass of an electron using household items? It's true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道可以用手边的家庭用品计算出电子的质量吗？这是真的哦。

yingyinNormal.en: They were always attentive and respectful, when I tell them about what it was like for me, growing up in a Chinese household with strict parents who made me study.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们总是很照顾人，尊重人，当我给他们讲我的故事，在中国人的家庭中长大，有非常严格的父母总是让我学习。

yingyinNormal.en: Why can't we just play with her friends. Because Topanga, The second she allowed Dr. Turtleneck and Mr. Howdy into our household, our family was compromised by interlopers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们何不跟她的朋友们一起玩呢。因为呀，塔佩佳，一旦她允许龟颈博士和豪迪先生闯入我们家，我们的家庭就会被外人攻占。

yingyinNormal.en: Please stay. We need at least one adult in this household.
yingyinNormal.zh: 求你别走，我们家至少需要一个大人。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, 15 years passed, we've grown so significantly and have become a household name in China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如今，十五年过去了，我们在中国已经成了一个家喻户晓的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a time when British Olympic medal winners became household names because there were so few of them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 曾经，英国奥林匹克奖牌获得者们因为人数稀少而家喻户晓。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, it's the most watched TV show on the planet and every household in China and beyond will be watching it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可是世界上收看人数最多的电视节目，中国的家家户户还有些别处的人们都在看。

yingyinNormal.en: We got a whole bunch of boats. 12 Jennys, big old warehouse. We even have hats that say Bubba Gump on them. Bubba Gump Shrimp. It's a household name.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们购置了一大堆船，有12条珍妮号，还有一个大仓库，我们还订做了帽子上面写着“布巴·甘” 。布巴·甘捕虾公司，这名字家喻户晓。

yingyinNormal.en: When you are married, you will make me the head of the royal household. Anastasia and Drisella we will pair off with wealthy lords. And I shall manage that boy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你结婚以后，你要奉我为皇室之首，安娜斯塔西亚和多莉希拉也要和贵族们成婚，并由我来掌管那男孩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a house and its occupants regarded as a unit

examination_example.sentence: And for women who work outside the home, they often are playing catch-up-with-<highlight>household</highlight> tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对在外工作的女性而言，她们常常回家后还要赶着完成家务活。

examination_example.sentence: Rare is the <highlight>household</highlight> in which the division of labor is so clinically and methodically laid out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很少有家庭能不偏不倚且有序地安排家务活。

examination_example.sentence: A big survey of Indian <highlight>households</highlight> in 2004 found that nearly 40% of emigrants had more than a high-school education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年对印度家庭的一项大型调查发现，将近40%的移民拥有高中以上的学历。

word_usage.usage: household作形容词，表示“家庭的”时，只能充当定语修饰名词，位于名词前，如：household chores 家庭杂务

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a house and its occupants regarded as a unit

examination_example.sentence: But one in three <highlight>households</highlight> doesn't have Internet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但三分之一的家庭没有互联网。

examination_example.sentence: Commentators seized on the recent report by the Census Bureau, which found that average <highlight>household</highlight> income rose by 5.2% in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 评论员们关注了美国人口普查局(Census Bureau)的最新报告，这份报告显示，2015年美国家庭平均收入增长了5.2%。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a house and its occupants regarded as a unit

examination_example.sentence: By 2014, 31.6% of young adults were living with a spouse or partner in their own <highlight>household</highlight>, below the share living in the home of their parent (s)  (32.1%) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到2014年，31.6%的年轻人与配偶或伴侣住在自己的家里，低于与父母同住的比例(32.1%)。

examination_example.sentence: Adults ages 18 to 34 were slightly more likely to be living in their parents'home than they were to be living with a spouse or partner in their own <highlight>household</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 18岁到34岁的成年人“住在父母家的可能性”首次略超“和配偶或伴侣住在自己家的可能性”。

examination_example.sentence: In 2014, more young women (16%) than young men (13%) were heading up a <highlight>household</highlight> without a spouse or partner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2014年，相对于年轻男性(13%)，更多年轻女性(16%)在撑起一个没有配偶或伴侣的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: This type of arrangement peaked around 1960, when 62% of the nation's 18-to 34-year-olds were living with a spouse or partner in their own <highlight>household</highlight>, and only one-in-five were living with their parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种方式在1960年左右达到顶峰，当时美国18岁到34岁的人中，62%的人和配偶或伴侣住在自己家中，只有五分之一的人与父母住在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Young adults with a college degree have fared much better in the labor market than their less-educated counterparts, which has in turn made it easier to establish their own <highlight>households</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥有大学学位的年轻人在劳动力市场上的表现远优于受教育程度较低的同龄人，这相应地使他们能更容易建立自己的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: To do this, the team used data from the British <highlight>Household</highlight> Panel Survey compiled by the University of Essex.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为此，该团队使用了由埃塞克斯大学编制的英国家庭调查问卷中的数据。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a house and its occupants regarded as a unit

examination_example.sentence: Age isn't the only factor; I'd say it's also to do with the makeup of your <highlight>household</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年龄不是唯一的因素；我认为这也和你家庭的构成有关。

examination_example.sentence: At home, my dad said, "A job's a big step to growing up. I'm glad you will be contributing to the <highlight>household</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家里，我爸爸说：“工作是长大的一大步。我很高兴你将为家庭做出贡献”。

examination_example.sentence: The average number of electronic devices rose from four per <highlight>household</highlight> in 1992 to 13 in 2007.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 平均每个家庭拥有的电子设备从1992年的4台增加到2007年的13台。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a house and its occupants regarded as a unit

examination_example.sentence: Why was Tom unable to pay for all the <highlight>household</highlight> expenses?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么汤姆无力支付所有的家庭开支？

examination_example.sentence: Wet waste is known as <highlight>household</highlight> waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 湿垃圾被称为家庭垃圾。

examination_example.sentence: Some grocery stores also sell <highlight>household</highlight> goods such as kitchen paper, cleaning things, and diapers (尿布).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些杂货店也出售家庭用品，如厨房用纸、清洁用品和尿布。
